title: Google Play Review
body: I had a horribly bad experience with this. I had ordered food for my mother while she was in Thiruvananthapuram. I live in Gujarat. I had located the place on their map and typed the address after that. After 45 minutes I tried to contact the delivery partner and he told me he was not able to reach the correct location as I had marked the place wrong. After that I got a call from their customer service and told me they are cancelling the order and I willl not get even one rupee as refund.
